about_the_game:
WetBread is a 2.5D Metroidvania Platformer, where you gain control of a Dry Rusk, travel through the store shelves of various departments, solve puzzles and fight enemies and bosses.





  • 2D side scroller with the possibility of changing the world axis.
  • 2D hand drawn animated frame-by-frame sprites set in a 3D realistic environment.
  • You ARE a food product. You fight zombified products. The game world is a supermarket.
  • Water is a double-edged sword: it's hazardous and can zombify products, but can also be used as an advantage.
  • Use your body parts to fight various enemies and solve environmental puzzles.
  • Gain new abilities and use them to explore and survive.





Your task is to catch the devious Big Billy, a rat in a vest, to take revenge for kidnapping part of your family, but most importantly to save the surviving members of it.



When Big Billy ran away, he turned on the fire sprinklers so that you could not catch up with him. The water has soaked everything in the store, so you have to face the zombie products - soaked breads that are falling apart from the water and the disadvantageous conditions of the store, blocked passages and water spilled everywhere.

name: WetBread

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4820K CPU @ 3.70GHz (8 CPUs), ~3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: TBA
